description: These shrimp tacos combine tender, seasoned shrimp with fresh shredded cabbage and creamy, spicy sauce.
ingredients: [{"name": "Greek yogurt", "units": "ml", "amount": 120}, {"name": "fresh lime juice", "units": "ml", "amount": 30}, {"name": "sriracha sauce", "units": "teaspoon", "amount": 0.5}, {"name": "garlic powder", "units": "teaspoon", "amount": 0.5}, {"name": "smoked paprika", "units": "teaspoon", "amount": 0.5}, {"name": "salt", "units": null, "amount": null}, {"name": "water", "units": null, "amount": null}, {"name": "large shrimp", "units": "g", "amount": 450}, {"name": "smoked paprika", "units": "teaspoon", "amount": 0.5}, {"name": "garlic powder", "units": "teaspoon", "amount": 0.5}, {"name": "dried oregano", "units": "teaspoon", "amount": 0.5}, {"name": "onion powder", "units": "teaspoon", "amount": 0.5}, {"name": "salt", "units": null, "amount": null}, {"name": "black pepper", "units": null, "amount": null}, {"name": "olive oil", "units": "ml", "amount": 15}, {"name": "small corn or flour tortillas", "units": "pieces", "amount": 8}, {"name": "small red or green cabbage", "units": "head", "amount": 0.5}, {"name": "avocado", "units": "piece", "amount": 1}, {"name": "fresh cilantro", "units": "g", "amount": 15}, {"name": "crumbled Cotija cheese", "units": "g", "amount": 30}]
instructions: Step 01: In a bowl, mix Greek yogurt, lime juice, sriracha, garlic powder, smoked paprika, and salt. Adjust consistency with water if too thick. Step 02: Season shrimp with smoked paprika, garlic powder, oregano, onion powder, salt, and black pepper. Step 03: Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat and fry shrimp for about 2 minutes on each side until pink and opaque. Step 04: Warm tortillas in a separate skillet or microwave until soft and warm. Step 05: On each tortilla, place cooked shrimp, then add shredded cabbage, avocado slices, cilantro, Cotija cheese, and drizzle with the spicy sauce.
notes: For added flavor, you can marinate the shrimp for 10 minutes before frying.
